segments.text: The boy is going to hurt himself if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tipping, and he’s still reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, not even trying to help him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor slippery, and someone is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t break anything when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to think this is all fun and games, but it’s not.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before this turns into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
